src.Enemy

Class EnemyType

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Enemy.EnemyType

  • public class EnemyType
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the stats of an enemy type so that it can be retrieved easily when a new enemy is instantiated

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnemyType(java.lang.String name, int spriteSheetX, int spriteSheetY, int numSprites, int health, int movementSpeed, int damage, int projectile, int fireRate)
      Initialise a new enemy type

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnemyType

        public EnemyType(java.lang.String name,
                 int spriteSheetX,
                 int spriteSheetY,
                 int numSprites,
                 int health,
                 int movementSpeed,
                 int damage,
                 int projectile,
                 int fireRate)
        Initialise a new enemy type
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the enemy type
        spriteSheetX - x-coordinate of the first sprite for the enemy type
        spriteSheetY - y-coordinate of the first sprite for the enemy type
        numSprites - The number of sprites that the enemy type uses
        health - The starting health of the enemy type
        movementSpeed - Movement speed of the enemy type
        damage - Damage of the enemy type
        projectile - ID of the projectile type that this enemy type fires
        fireRate - The fire rate of the enemy type
